short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Jump to custom pages using URL Templates. Type "q mySearchTerm" to visit "https://example.com?q=mySearchTerm"

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Boost Your Browsing Efficiency with Custom URL Shortcut Templates!

🔗 Supercharge Your Searches with this powerful Chrome extension. Create personalized URL shortcuts by simply typing q [keyword] [search term] in the search box.

⚡ Instant Access: Translate keywords into custom URL formats like https://example.com?q={KEY} for quick and convenient access to search terms, issue tracker tickets, and more!

💼 Speed Up Your Workflow: With minimal keystrokes, you can jump directly into specific Issue Tracker tickets, frequently used CRM systems, or any other web tool. The possibilities are endless!

🌟 Key Features:

🔧 Customizable URLs: Add, edit, or delete multiple URL templates tailored to your needs.

⭐ Default URL Settings: Set a default URL and keyword for even faster searches.

🎨 User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy an intuitive, well-commented codebase, and a sleek, modern UI.

💡 Example:

Description: Show Atlassian Pull Requests containing {KEY} on GitHub

URL: https://github.com/search?q=org:atlassian+{KEY}&type=pullrequests

🎯 Why Choose Custom URL Shortcut?

🚀 Streamline Your Workflow: Quick access to custom URLs saves you time.

💻 Sleek Design: A modern interface that's easy on the eyes and simple to use.

🌐 Universal Compatibility: Perfect for sites using query strings like Jira, GitHub, Bitbucket, Trello, Google, Asana, and more.

Try Custom URL Shortcut today and take control of your web navigation! 🌟
